name: RTCDtlsTransport
description: The RTCDtlsTransport interface provides access to information about the Datagram Transport Layer Security (DTLS) transport over which a RTCPeerConnection's RTP and RTCP packets are sent and received by its RTCRtpSender and RTCRtpReceiver objects.

refs.name: WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers
refs.description: The definition of 'RTCDtlsTransport' in WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers.
